items.scripture: Revelation 3:7 — He who opens and no one shuts, and shuts and no one opens.
items.worship: Exalt the 'Key of David' who opens the day.
items.rhythm: Stand at your door or window and face the new day.
items.decree: I command the gates of this day to open for my advancement.

items.scripture: Isaiah 46:10 — Declaring the end from the beginning.
items.worship: Worship the 'Alpha and Omega' who sees all.
items.rhythm: Kneel in silence for 2 minutes, then look upward.
items.decree: I receive the vision to see past the doors of 2025 into 2026.

items.scripture: Lamentations 3:23 — His mercies are new every morning.
items.worship: Praise the King arriving with the rising sun.
items.rhythm: Stretch your arms wide to welcome the light.
items.decree: I decree that glory, not gloom, enters my house this morning.

items.scripture: James 1:5 — If any of you lacks wisdom, ask God.
items.worship: Exalt the source of all Strategy and Intellect.
items.rhythm: Open your hands like a book to receive wisdom.
items.decree: I decree that the King of Glory governs my mind and my work.

items.scripture: Psalm 24:7 — Lift up your heads, O gates, that the King of Glory may come in.
items.rhythm: Lift your hands high in total surrender to the King.

items.scripture: Joel 2:25 — I will restore the years the locust has eaten.
items.worship: Worship the Conqueror who restores the waste.
items.rhythm: Pace your room (Prophetic walking) while praying.
items.decree: Every broken gate in my life is being repaired by the King.

items.scripture: Philippians 4:7 — The peace of God will guard your hearts and minds.
items.worship: Praise the King who secures the city at sunset.
items.rhythm: Place your hand on your heart to symbolize peace.
items.decree: I seal my progress today under the authority of the King.

items.scripture: Psalm 121:4 — He who keeps Israel will neither slumber nor sleep.
items.worship: Exalt the King who stands guard over sleep.
items.rhythm: Lay prostrate or bow to acknowledge His protection.
items.decree: I decree that the King of Glory stands guard over my dreams.
